executeAAVEFlashloan(uint256,address,uin.notice: Execute AAVE flashloan with fuzzed parameters

executeUniswapFlashSwap(uint256,address,.notice: Execute Uniswap flash swap with fuzzed parameters

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract AAVEFlashloan,contract UniswapFlashSwap,contract MockAAVEPool,contract MockUniswapPool,contract MockERC20,contract MockERC20,contract MockERC20,address,address) returns (contract Handler)

documentation.text: @notice Invariant: Fee BPS should never exceed MAX_FEE_BPS

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Swap contract balance cannot be negative"

arguments.value: Swap contract balance cannot be negative

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Swap contract balance cannot be negative"

documentation.text:
@notice Invariant: Contract should never lose tokens without reason
 @dev Solvency check: contract balance should always be >= collected fees
@notice Invariant: Owner should always be set and valid
@notice Invariant: Pool address should always be set for AAVE
@notice Invariant: Min profit should be reasonable (not excessive)
@notice Execute AAVE flashloan with fuzzed parameters
@notice Execute Uniswap flash swap with fuzzed parameters
